DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is to detect the prevalence of chronic rhinosinusitis and the colonisation with Pseudomonas aerug. in the upper airways in patients with cystic fibrosis.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Chronic Rhinosinusitis in Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Subject has a confirmed diagnosis of cystic fibrosis current systemic therapy against Pseudomonas aeruginosa
